message.content:
Ewe, ndiyakunceda. Ndibhalele iskripthi esinokukhusela imoto ezizimeleyo. Iqhekeza imoto kwi-Xhosa, ndinceda ngokunikeza izimvo ngolwimi lwesiXhosa. 

1. Ukunceda imoto itshoule:
   - Hambisa kuqala isikrini sakho sokunxibelelwano ne-imoto.
   - Xa kunye nezinto ezahlukileyo, chumisa isikrini, abantu abangakwazi ukwenza okwangoku babonisele isikrini sokunxibelelwano.
   - Khetha "Ukugalela imoto" kubomvu ebhokisi lesikrini.
   - Xa unemvume yokugalela imoto, vula amalungiselelo amakhulu athile ezilungiselela imoto.
   - Xa isikrini sithi "Galela imoto", gqibela imoto ngokuqinisekisa ukuba isandulele kugqibelele.

2. Ukunika inqaku ku-imoto:
   - Hambisa kuqala isikrini sakho sokunxibelelwano ne-imoto.
   - Xa kunye nezinto ezahlukileyo, chumisa isikrini, abantu abangakwazi ukwenza okwangoku babonisele isikrini sokunxibelelwano.
   - Khetha "Ukunika inqaku ku-imoto" kubomvu ebhokisi lesikrini.
   - Xa unemvume yokunika inqaku, qinisekisa ukuba unemvume yesikrini sokunika inqaku.
   - Xa isikrini sithi "Nika inqaku ku-imoto", qinisekisa ukuba inqaku yemoto ithandazileyo ithandazileyo.

3. Ukunceda imoto ibe yomileyo:
   - Hambisa kuqala isikrini sakho sokunxibele
